column2: Many scholars have been travelling around the world to find the best way to educate the people of $COUNTRY$. These people have brought their knowledge back to help our country into the modern era of the industrial revolution. Word has spread about the new cultured schools in $COUNTRY$ and people are wondering what is the best way to move forward. Encouraging learning of the new ways could drastically increase our education but some might rather the ancient ways.

column4: Zu schlau sein gibt es nicht.
column5: El político y abogado Horace Mann comenzó sus reformas del sistema educativo de Massachussetts. Su sistema escolar se convirtió en el modelo para todos los Estados Unidos.

column2: We are doing just fine with our traditional ways.
